text_block_list.text: Early one day on a dimly lit morning…

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Marvelousness starts now☆★☆★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Marve-chin?! If you're around here, say "Marvelous!". Jeez, where could she have gone? Ooh!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Brian-san! You're supposed to be looking for Marve-chin too! She's been missing since morning! Are you not worried about her?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Not particularly. She's probably just busy right now. And quit yelling at me. I don't want people to associate me with you.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: But Marve-chin is super super curious! What if she managed to get to space or something…?! Waah! Marve-chin!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm tired of this. I'm going home.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Are those cherry blossom petals? Isn't it way too early for that?
Hehe… Ahaha! Yup, that's perfect!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Spinny spinny! Poof! We need more and more! Bloom in marvelousness☆

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Spinny spinny♪ Poof♪ Hmm? Is that Brian-chan?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I have no idea what you two are doing.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: I had a feeling that marvelousness was beginning, but I didn't know where☆ But it turns out that Laurel found it first★ Marvelousness truly has begun!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hehe. I found a cherry blossom tree blooming early. Look, it's over there. It seems like that's what Marve-chin was looking for too.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Aah, so the cherry blossoms I saw were from here. I guess spring really is coming.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Yup, and another form of spring is coming too! The spring of Sakura Laurel!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Your spring, huh?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: If the cherry blossoms are beginning to bloom, then as a Sakura I have to bloom as well. I'll bloom brighter than anyone else. Look forward to it, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Kyaa☆ I feel like something marvelous is gonna happen★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Heeey!! You guys are big meanies! Having fun without me…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: More importantly! I'm the one who's supposed to be having a marvelous time with Brian!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hehe, well why don't we head back to the academy? It's been a while since we've all hung out, so why don't we continue this conversation on the track? ♪
At the same time.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh ho! What a coincidence… Or should I say that this was highly probable? That family restaurant is your favorite after all, so perhaps it was an inevitability.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Come now, don't make that face. We're friends, are we not? Why don't we gather around the table and eat together harmoniously like we always do?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Parfait parfait parfaifaifait♪

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh ho? The coincidences continue to occur, huh? You seem quite pleased, Pocke-kun.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Ooh, if it isn't Tachyon and Cafe! Check this parfait out! It's got so many things on it, all topped off by cherries. What do you guys think?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I don't know what to say…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Isn't it perfect?! Parfaits really are the best! You two should order one too so we can eat some together♪

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haa… I was planning on getting coffee here and enjoying my afternoon… but I seem to have been swept up by two annoying individuals…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I don't need to explain why Tachyon-san is a problem, but Pocke-san… aside from her crudeness, she's quite intimidating…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Aaah!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What's with you? Why're you yelling so loudly? All I did was take the cherry that you left. You were just staring at them, so it's not my fault.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: I left it for a reason!! That was the best part!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmph, my apologies. But don't you think you're worrying too much over some cherries? They've already been turned into fructose inside of my body after all.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: What do you mean by some cherries?!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: I'm tired of you. Shut up.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ooh, how frightening. Was me taking those cherries the trigger for this sudden change?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: I'll show you what happens when you push my buttons. Meet me outside.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haa, I'll just get her a new—
Alright, that's enough, you two.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Fuji-san!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Sorry for being late, Pocke. I was busy dealing with some issues at the dormitories. Have you been waiting long? Sorry if you have.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it, I get that you're busy! Plus, I was just having a nice chat with my two classmates! Isn't that right, Tachyon♪ Cafe♪

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Such extreme shifts in personality…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Well, I'm glad to see you're all getting along… but this seems hard on Cafe.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No, not particularly… if those two had gotten violent, I would've borrowed my friend's power to take care of them both.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Wait, i-is that… a… gh-ghost?! Uwaaaaah?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh ho, that was dangerous. Overwhelming pressure that could cause anyone nearby to wither, while also having the ability to see the invisible. What an intriguing girl.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hehe, hey now Pocke. You're trying to become the strongest, right? To do that, you've got to be able to befriend any and everyone.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: You're right! If I try my best, I can even befriend a gho— your friend! I'll be relying on you, Cafe!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haa…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Great! Since you've all been so great, I'll be treating you today. Order whatever you'd like.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Once we've finished, let's walk home together. Back to Tracen Academy!
